caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. SAMMY BLAIR WALLER, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 80-1-02463-5, Lee Kraft, J., entered November 4, 1980.
